## Shiny Presentation

This app is an exercise in taking the data from the Reproducible Research Peer Assessment Project.  

The app allows the user to specify the number of days to aggregate the total number of steps.  

## Source Code Location

The source code for the shiny app, ui.R and server.R, can be found in the same directory as the original project at:

https://github.com/cy1135/RepData_PeerAssessment1

## App URL

The app location can be found here:
